name: Pinakpani Pal
content: Pinakpani Pal's Home Page Pinakpani Pal M.C.A., Ph.D. Electronics and Communication Sciences Unit Indian Statistical Institute 203 Barackpore Trunk Road Kolkata 700 108 West Bengal India e-mail: pinak@isical.ac.in Projects/advisory role with Government Organisations: Reserve Bank of India, Mumbai National Sample Survey Organisation West Bengal Infrastructure Development Finance Corporation Limited Consultancy/Pilot Projects with Industries: 2021-22 TCS Limited, Mumbai Expert Advice on various project conducted by TCS (mainly on Computer Science and Business Systems). 2020-21 TCS Limited, Mumbai Expert Advice on various project conducted by TCS (mainly on Computer Science and Business Systems). 2019-20 TCS Limited, Mumbai Expert Advice on various project conducted by TCS (mainly on Computer Science and Business Systems). 2018-19 TCS Limited, Mumbai Expert Advice on various project conducted by TCS (mainly on Computer Science and Business Systems). R.S. Software AI/ML algorithms for real time and post facto fraud detection. 2016-17 TCS iON Test Analytics: a pilot project to evaluating framework for various online test conducted. I am Life Member of Indian Society of Geomatics Indian Society of Remote Sensing Cryptology Research Society of India The Indian Science Congress Association Indian Unit for Pattern Recognition and Artificial Intelligence
